caption.p: The antibacterial activity of the electrospun mats of HTCs, HTCs-capsaicin, HTCs-AuNPs and HTCs-capsaicin/AuNPs against P. multocida, K. rhinoscleromatis, S. pyogenes, and V. vulnificus. (Data are presented as mean Â± S.D., (* P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001); n = 3). (CA refers to capsaicin).
